translations: n.[计]假脱机；多任务缓冲处理；自动收线装置
v.把……绕在卷轴上；假脱机输入（spool 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: This is where job spooling can provide a solution.
sentences.translation: 作业假脱机就可以提供这种解决方案。

sentences.sentence: Spooling can also be turned off at any point in a session, as shown below.
sentences.translation: 也可以在一个会话中的任何时间点关闭假脱机功能，如下所示。

sentences.sentence: IBM I has a print spooling system that manages the output of various programs.
sentences.translation: IBM i拥有一个后台打印系统，用于管理各种程序的输出。
